word embeddings.from sentence: The word embeddings are initialized with 200 - dimension GloVE vectors and fine - tuned during the training .

Adam ( Kingma and Ba 2014 ).from sentence: The Adam ( Kingma and Ba 2014 ) is used as the optimizer with the initial learning rate 10 ? 4 .

Gradients.from sentence: Gradients with the 2 norm larger than 40 are normalized to be 40 .

All weights.from sentence: All weights in networks are randomly initialized from a uniform distribution U ( ? 0.01 , 0.01 ) .

batch sizes.from sentence: The batch sizes are 64 and 32 for source and target domains , respectively .

overfitting.from sentence: To alleviate overfitting , we apply dropout on the word embeddings of the context with dropout rate 0.5 .

perform.from sentence: We also perform early stopping on the validation set during the training process .

tuned on.from sentence: The hyperparameters are tuned on 10 % randomly held - out training data of the target domain in R1?L task and are fixed to be used in all transfer pairs .
